ACADEMIC RESEARCH & INTERGRITY

Welcome to this focused online module on Academic Research and Integrity. Whether you’re new to university or sharpening your skills, this course is your guide to mastering the essentials of academic research and maintaining integrity in your work. At the heart of academic success lies the ability to find credible information, use it wisely, and present it ethically, skills that will set you apart in your studies and beyond.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Understand Academic Research: Grasp what academic research is, why it’s critical, and how to approach it systematically.

+  Evaluate Source Credibility: Learn to assess sources using five key criteria to ensure reliability and relevance.

+  Master Paraphrasing: Develop the ability to rephrase ideas from sources in your own words while preserving their meaning.

+  Plan Effective Research: Explore strategies to organize your research process and filter out unreliable information.

+  Apply Practical Techniques: Use interactive tools to practice research and citation skills in real-world academic scenarios.
